article_title: Brother of Hamas victim accuses SNP of double standards on Israel
sentence: The  brother  of  a  British-Israeli  man  killed  by  Hamas  has  accused  the  SNP  of  double  standards  in  its  stance  on  Israel.

article_title: Brother of Hamas victim accuses SNP of double standards on Israel
sentence: Bernard  Cowan,  originally  from  Glasgow,  was  killed  by  Hamas  gunmen  in  his  home  on  a  kibbutz  in  Southern  Israel  during  the  7  October  attack.

article_title: Brother of Hamas victim accuses SNP of double standards on Israel
sentence: More  than  40,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  as  a  result  of  Israeli  military  action  in  Gaza  since  the  7  October  attacks,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  has  said.
